item.title: Web Server on AMI Linux 2
item.description: Welcome in 2019 – it’s time to upgrade out outdated LAMP stack series articles, with new “How To” setup basic web server for our stack.

item.title: How to install node.js on AWS AMI Linux instance
item.description: It’s even simpler than more tutorials are saying. After login to instance, just enable EPEL repository
